class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        pieces = [1, 1]
        cuts = [(-cost, 0) for cost in horizontalCut] + [(-cost, 1) for cost in verticalCut]
        heapq.heapify(cuts)
        answer = 0
        while cuts:
            negative_cost, t = heapq.heappop(cuts)
            answer -= negative_cost * pieces[(t + 1) & 1]
            pieces[t] += 1
        return answer
